advisory.name: RLBA-2021:4470
advisory.synopsis: man-db bug fix and enhancement update
advisory.topic: An update for man-db is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisory.description:
For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation
Enterprise Linux 8.5 Release Notes linked from the References section.

fixes.description: After installing lapack package, server shutdown is delayed while man-db-cache-update.service runs
